casebody.data:
Garry N. SAVAGE, Sr., and Garry N. Savage, Jr., Appellants,
v.
Bethine FILION, Individually, as Sole Successor Trustee of the Filion Family Living Trust, Dated 01/18/1992, and as Beneficiary of Her Iras and Those of the Late Richard Filion, Appellee. Case No. 2D17-4923 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 7, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
